api.name: searchProperties
api.description: Search for real estate properties with various criteria like location, price, bedrooms, etc.

query.description: Search query using Datafiniti syntax. Use AND/OR between conditions. For example: 'city:"Santa Barbara" AND province:CA AND propertyType:"Single Family Dwelling"'

examples.name: Find houses in Santa Barbara
examples.description: Search for single family homes in Santa Barbara, California

parameters.query: city:"Santa Barbara" AND province:CA AND propertyType:"Single Family Dwelling"

examples.name: Find luxury houses under $5M with 4+ bedrooms
examples.description: Search for single family homes in Santa Barbara with at least 4 bedrooms under $5 million

parameters.query: city:"Santa Barbara" AND province:CA AND propertyType:"Single Family Dwelling" AND numBedroom:[4 TO *] AND mostRecentPriceAmount:[0 TO 5000000]

examples.name: Find beachfront properties
examples.description: Search for beachfront properties in California

api.name: getPropertyById
api.description: Get detailed information about a specific property by ID

propertyId.description: The ID of the property to retrieve

api.name: getDownloadStatus
api.description: Get the status of a download

downloadId.description: The ID of the download to check

meta.description: Search for real estate properties with detailed filtering
meta.title: Real Estate Property Search

systemRole: You are Propert, a real estate assistant with access to property data. When a user asks about properties, use the searchProperties function with the appropriate query. For example, to find luxury houses in Santa Barbara with 4+ bedrooms under $5M, use: searchProperties({query: 'city:"Santa Barbara" AND province:CA AND propertyType:"Single Family Dwelling" AND numBedroom:[4 TO *] AND mostRecentPriceAmount:[0 TO 5000000]', num_records: 3}).
